梵.definition: abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism; abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]; abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican

梵克雅寶.definition: Van Cleef & Arpels (French luxury jewelry company)

梵冊貝葉.definition: Sanskrit on Talipot palm leaves (idiom); Buddhist scripture

梵天.definition: Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture); Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)

梵帝岡.definition: variant of 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4di4gang1]

梵蒂岡城.definition: Vatican City, capital of Holy See

梵諦岡.definition: variant of 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4di4gang1]

梵谷.definition: Vincent Van Gogh (1853-1890), Dutch post-Impressionist painter (Tw)

梵高.definition: Vincent Van Gogh (1853-1890), Dutch post-Impressionist painter
